value.title: The Robots Are Coming for Phil in Accounting

value.title: Open machine learning and AI data can increase ship energy efficiency
value.excerpt: The Swedish ship operator Ventrafiken and the research project “Data-driven energy efficiency for ships” (D2E2F) have established a collaboration to collect open data for research purposes. One of the double ended ferries (Uraniborg) have been equipped with a Blueflow Energy Management System to collect data on energy consumers and vessel data.

value.title: Researchers developed an AI that scours existing drugs for new Alzheimer’s treatments
value.excerpt: Scientists used a machine-learning framework called DRIAD to identify a range of medications that could be repurposed to treat Alzheimer's disease.

value.title: IDC: Ethical AI is a team sport that requires smart and strong referees
value.excerpt: New research finds that the lack of responsible artificial intelligence guidelines is one of the top three barriers to wider adoption.

value.title: Tom Cruise deepfake creator says public shouldn’t be worried about ‘one-click fakes’

value.title: Scientists made an AI that reads your mind so it can generate portraits you’ll find attractive
value.excerpt: A team of researchers recently developed a mind-reading AI that uses an individual’s personal preferences to generate portraits of attractive people who don’t exist. Computer-generated beauty truly is in the AI of the beholder.

value.title: Facebook’s New AI Teaches Itself to See With Less Human Help

value.title: Scientists seek to enhance artificial intelligence by integrating brain cells
value.excerpt: With a new grant from the U.S. Army, a team of scientists will seek to enhance artificial intelligence by integrating brain cells called astrocytes.
